articles.title: Microsoft triples down on Xbox hardware commitment, while also teasing first-party gaming handhelds — will it actually happen? - Windows Central
articles.description: Rumors of Xbox's first-imposed demise have been greatly exaggerated, after Xbox president took to Variety to reiterate the firm's commitment to gaming hardware.

articles.description: Indycar Racing 2 was a good game, back in 1995; in some ways, it was the Crysis of the Clinton years, in that most mortals could not run it to its full potential when it was new. Still, that potent…
